Expressions.Title: CLICK Shorthand: + AP
Expressions.Description: This shorthand command will create the text for the clicking of a menu button. This optional qualifier will indicate that the button that you are clicking on it in the action pane.

Templates.Template: Click the $3 button in the $2 group of the $1 action pane

Templates.Introduction: To do this, {just|all we need to do is}
Templates.Template: Click on the $3 button within the $2 group of the $1 action pane tab
Click on the $3 button within the $2 group of the $1 action pane tab

Expressions.Title: CLICK Shorthand: + > TB

Templates.Template: Click the $2 menu button in the $1 toolbar

Templates.Introduction: To do this, {just|all we need to do is}
Templates.Template: Click on the $2 button within the $1 toolbar
Click on the $2 button within the $1 toolbar

Expressions.Title: SET Shorthand: DD :
Expressions.Description: This shorthand command will create an assignment statement for a field.  This is an optional qualifier that identifies that the field is a dropdown value.

Templates.Introduction: To do this, {we will need to|}

Templates.Template: Click on the $1 dropdown list and select $2

Expressions.Title: NAV Shorthand: SEARCH >
Expressions.Description: This shorthand command will build a Navigation command from a path. This option will allow you to create a navigation command that is using the search feature.

Templates.Template: We can {get to|find|access} the $3 menu item through the menu search option.

Templates.Introduction: To do this, {we will need to|}
Templates.Template: Click on the search box in the header of the form (or press ALT+G), type $2 into the search box and, select the $3 menu item from the list of results

Expressions.Title: NAV Shorthand: > > >
Expressions.Description: This shorthand command will build a Navigation command from a path.
Expressions.Example: Organization administration > Global address book > Addresses > Address setup

Templates.Template: We can {get to|find|access} the $4 form through the main menu.

Templates.Introduction: To do this, {we will need to|}
Templates.Template: Open the navigation pane, expand out the Modules and group, click on the $1 group to see all the available menu items and then click on the $4 menu item within the $3 folder of the $2 group

Expressions.Title: NAV Shorthand: > >

Expressions.Example: Product information management > Products > Released products

Templates.Template: We can {get to|find|access} the $3 form through the main menu.

Templates.Introduction: To do this, {we will need to|}
Templates.Template: Open the navigation pane, expand out the Modules and group, click on the $1 group to see all the available menu items and then click on the $3 menu item within the $2 group
